detail_desc: T-shirt in cotton piqué with a button placket and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Shirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cropped top in jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top and glittery elastic hem.
Fitted, one-shoulder, calf-length dress woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Draping at the top, a concealed zip in one side and one long, wide puff sleeve with pleats at the top. Unlined.
Trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button and side, back and leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs. Tapered legs with seams at the knees.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.
Short-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a textured pima cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and high cut back with a gather.
Track pants in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and cuffed hems.
Joggers in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Shirt dress in soft viscose twill with a collar, button placket, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Ear cuff in metal decorated with plastic rhinestones.
Double-layered hat in patterned cotton jersey with a small appliqué at the hem.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a square neckline front and back.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a low crotch.
V-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with dropped shoulders, short dolman sleeves, pleats at the top of the front and a box pleat at the back of the neck.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in a rib knit. Low-cut neckline with a twisted detail at the back.
Long, transparent mesh skirt with smocking at the waist. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed viscose with a deep neckline front and back, press-studs at the top, long sleeves and an overlocked edge at the cuffs and hem.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Nightslip in soft jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, triangular lace cups with removable inserts and a lace trim under the bust.
Strappy top in soft jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a slightly deeper neckline front and back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Top with a shirt collar, two press-studs at the front, a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, diagonal zip down the front and welt side pockets. Lined.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening, padded edge and tongue, glitter print on one side and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Velour soft toy with embroidered details and a removable outfit with a bow, embroidered details and hook and loop fastener. Polyester filling. Length approx. 22 cm.

Jacket in soft faux fur with a zip down the front and a jersey-lined hood with ear-shaped appliqués on top. Patch front pockets and wide, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined. The sleeves are lined in recycled polyester.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and visible elastication at the hem.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and pair of shorts in a patterned viscose weave. Top with a V-neck, covered buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Short chunky metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a padlock. Adjustable length 45-52 cm.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Slim Fit.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Short top in soft fleece with a stand-up collar with a zip at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem.
Strapless jersey dress with an elasticated waist. Inner top with elastication at the top.
Jacket in soft pile with a high stand-up collar, concealed zip down the front, side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow and scalloped trim at the top, and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a boat neck, dropped shoulders with decorative buttons, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Full-length trousers in airy linen. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a T-shirt, pair of shorts and sun hat in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt that is slightly longer and rounded at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Waistcoat in Oxford cotton with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Waist bag in woven fabric with a zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Size approx. 3.5x10x19 cm.
Trousers in airy viscose with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.

Shirt in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons at the top and tie belt under the bust. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Round neckline, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lace blouse with a small stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long, wide sleeves. Scalloped edge at the collar, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft, textured knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Jumper knitted in a mohair blend with a sequined pattern, low dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front that continues part-way down one leg, a zipped chest pocket and elastication at the back, cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the knees and back, reinforced elastic straps at the hems and reflective details. Fleece lining. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Dress in an airy crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wrapover opening, ties at the waist and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Relaxed-fit tops in soft cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a print motif on the front and a rounded hem with a fabric appliqué at the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with a small bow at the neckline and short, flounced sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist and gathered frills at the hems.
Block-coloured top in organic cotton jersey with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and short slits in the hems.
